cleaned_text: Location Hours 7 AM - 7:30 PM | Monday - Thursday 7 AM - 5:30 PM | Friday Lab at Madsen Health Center Mon - Fri: 7:30 AM - 5:30 PM Serving the Communities of East Salt Lake & University of Utah Located on the east side of Salt Lake City, the Madsen Health Center is right down the street from University of Utah Health's hospitals, specialty clinics, pharmacy, and eye center. Besides providing primary care, we have providers who specialize in maternity care, sports medicine, and caring for LGBTQ patients. We accept most insurance plans and offer same-day appointments.
